code:
module TopModule(
    input logic in,
    input logic [1:0] state,
    output logic [1:0] next_state,
    output logic out
);

    always @(*) begin
        case (state)
            2'b00: begin // State A
                next_state = (in == 1'b0) ? 2'b00 : 2'b01; // A -> A or B
                out = 1'b0;
            end
            2'b01: begin // State B
                next_state = (in == 1'b0) ? 2'b10 : 2'b01; // B -> C or B
                out = 1'b0;
            end
            2'b10: begin // State C
                next_state = (in == 1'b0) ? 2'b00 : 2'b11; // C -> A or D
                out = 1'b0;
            end
            2'b11: begin // State D
                next_state = (in == 1'b0) ? 2'b10 : 2'b01; // D -> C or B
                out = 1'b1;
            end
            default: begin
                next_state = 2'b00;
                out = 1'b0;
            end
        endcase
    end

endmodule
